title: Risk of Rain 2 gets an hour-long free trial on Stadia, no account required
content:
Google Stadia debuted its completely free game trials last year, and the feature is expanding. As Google opens up free Stadia trials to all developers, Risk of Rain 2 is opening up its own hour-long trial.

more…

The post Risk of Rain 2 gets an hour-long free trial on Stadia, no account required appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Risk of Rain 2 has a new completely free trial out on Google Stadia that lets you play the game for an hour with no downloads or payments.
